compat-change.description: The BG-launch FGS restriction feature is going to be allowed only for apps targetSdkVersion is higher than R.
compat-change.name: FGS_BG_START_RESTRICTION_CHANGE_ID

compat-change.description: If a service can not become foreground service due to BG-FGS-launch restriction or other reasons, throws an IllegalStateException.
compat-change.name: FGS_START_EXCEPTION_CHANGE_ID
